description:
We get a look at Young Hozuki and what he was like when he was younger. Later, Hozuki has to deal with some children who ended up in Hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le show de la princesse Sakuya / Rébellion sur les rives du Styx
Princess Sakuya no Showtime / Sainokawara no Koubou
Princess Sakuya`s Showtime / The Battle of Children`s Limbo
プリンセスサクヤのショータイム / 賽の河原の攻防
